hypothesis_content.title: BTC Regime Transition Momentum Fade
hypothesis_content.statement: When BTC transitions from NEUTRAL to BULL regime (as defined by FjordHQ's regime classifier), a sharp initial price surge (>8% in 48 hours) will experience a mean-reversion pullback of 3-5% within the next 5 trading days before resuming the bull trend.
hypothesis_content.rationale: Early bull regime transitions often trigger FOMO buying that becomes overextended. High funding rates and overbought conditions create temporary selling pressure from profit-taking and short-term rebalancing.
entry_conditions: Regime signal shifts from NEUTRAL to BULL (confidence > 65%)
BTC price rallies >8% from regime transition point within 48 hours
BTC perpetual funding rate turns positive > 0.01% (8h MA)

exit_conditions.stop_loss: Price makes new high above entry +1%

hypothesis_content.falsification_criteria: If >70% of such transitions show continued momentum without meaningful pullback (>2%) within 5 days.
